body:
Fire has been changed somehow - it just doesn't burn like it used to, it is now hard to burn down bases, trees, etc.

And the flint & steel has also been changed, it is very hard to start something on fire or to set a forest on fire.  The fire doesn't spread right and after clicking a few times it says something like "autoclick detected, wait ten seconds".  Um... kind of hard to wait ten seconds if you are in the middle of a fight.

Please set the fire setting back to what it used to be, and get rid of the autoclick sensitivity on flint and steel.

Also, I know that gravel no longer falls before wall drop - can that be changed back?  It's part of the game.

Thanks!

replies.body:
And there's a problem with hidden fire.  If you use the fire charge on the ground the fire doesn't appear, but it's on fire and if you walk through it you burn.

And you can't set trees / bases on fire anymore with flint / steel, or fire charges?
